title: (x) CWU admissions font - (Neue) Frutiger Black {Reed R}
content:
trying to identify the font for use in other material, but can't quite figure it out! any help is appreciated, as always.

wonderful community, i'm addicted.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cwuadmissions.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106051009/http:/typophile.com/files/cwuadmissions.png) | 83.43 KB |
author: ishbog

comments.content: Either [Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106051009/http:/www.linotype.com/469/frutiger-family.html?subviewmode=FONTS&samplestr=Central+builds+lives) or [Neue Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106051009/http:/www.linotype.com/610683/neuefrutiger-family.html?subviewmode=FONTS&samplestr=Central+builds+lives). I'm going with Neue Frutiger.
